events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund because this is not what I paid for.
The reported issue has been identified as a refund request due to incorrect item delivery.
Customer support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle this refund request.
Hello! I’m Sarah, and I’ll assist you with your refund request today. Could you please provide your order number?
To process your refund, please confirm the order number and describe the item you received versus what you ordered.
My order number is 987654321. I ordered a wireless headset, but instead I got a charging cable which I don’t need.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a refund for the incorrect item and send you a prepaid return label for the charging cable.
That sounds great, thanks for handling this quickly. I will await the return label and refund confirmation.
The refund has been processed and the return label emailed to you. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm you received the refund and returned the incorrect item without any issues.
We are closing this case now. Thank you for your patience and please contact us anytime if you have other concerns.
